array.dict: cell PSGroupCell label Admin Module //this is what will write over the toggle (example the description of the toggle)

cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults the.overmind.rePLAY //insted "xxx" write you bundle (the same in your tweak.xm, but here without ".plist" extension) key kAdmin //must be the same in your tweak.xm label Enable //this is the text that will appear at the left of your toggle
